mapper.select: SELECT t.table_name as tableName, c.comments as comments FROM user_tables t LEFT outer JOIN user_tab_comments c ON t.table_name = c.table_name WHERE Upper(t.table_name) = Upper(#{tableName})

SELECT utc.column_name as columnName, utc.data_type as dataType, utc.data_length as characterOctetLength, utc.nullable as isNullable, ucc.comments as comments FROM user_tab_columns utc LEFT JOIN user_col_comments ucc ON utc.TABLE_NAME = ucc.TABLE_NAME AND utc.column_name = ucc.column_name WHERE utc.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
SELECT col.column_name as columnName FROM user_constraints con, user_cons_columns col WHERE con.constraint_name = col.constraint_name AND con.constraint_type = 'P' AND col.table_name = #{tableName}
